data.title: Time Zones in Taiwan
data.meta_description: In which time zone is Taiwan? Are there any Daylight Saving Time changes in 2024?
data.text:
10:53:47

Samstag, 10. August 2024

Fullscreen

Country: TaiwanLong Name: Republic of ChinaAbbreviations: TW, TWNCapital: TaipeiTime Zones: 1Dial Code: +886

Time Zone Currently Being Used in Taiwan

OffsetTime Zone Abbreviation & NameExample CityCurrent TimeUTC +8CSTChina Standard TimeTaipeiSa, 10:53:47

Taiwan observes China Standard Time all year. There are no Daylight Saving Time clock changes.
